mapper.select: SELECT a.ID AS id, MAX(a.AUTH) AS auth, MAX(ISNULL(b.NAME, '')) AS name, MAX(ISNULL(b.ROLL_PSTN_NM, '')) AS ROLL_PSTN_NM, MAX(ISNULL(b.DEPT_NM, '')) AS deptNm, MAX(ISNULL(b.CORP_NM, '')) AS corpNm FROM sys_menu_auth a LEFT OUTER JOIN [UNIERP_DB2_80].SPG.dbo.CRM_USER_MASTER b ON a.ID = b.USR_ID GROUP BY a.ID

SELECT ISNULL(a.ID, '') AS id, ISNULL(a.M_CODE, '') AS mCode, ISNULL(a.AUTH, '') AS auth FROM sys_menu_auth a LEFT OUTER JOIN [UNIERP_DB2_80].SPG.dbo.CRM_USER_MASTER b ON a.ID = b.USR_ID WHERE a.id = #{userId}
